lyrics.text: This is what happens to whoever follows you
In the beginning, he finds an angel
and surrenders to you
and it doesn't show
You've done my heart wrong, you've worn it down
And I was already attached to you
I didn't know that you've got all this in you
Turns out you just talk and say just words
and in the end, you've got no feelings
I lived for you,
I was with you
what will you say to me?
I'm forgetting about you
You're going to come and say that it was hard to be away from me
And I've sworn that I'm going to make you regret it
The days have messed you up, you see?
I'm not going to ask what they've done to you
my heart has quit loving you
I no longer see my world through your eyes
Wady akhret elly yemshi warak yla'i fel awel zay malak w-ysalem lik maybansh 3alik zalamt 'alby, ta3abto ma3ak.
Wana kont khalas mt3alla' bik ma3reftesh in da kol da fik, atarik bet'ool fi kalam w-khalas w-atarik wla lik fil ehsas.
Ana 3ish lik kont ana wayak, hat'olly leih makhalas hansak.
Hatgily t'ool fi ghiaby ta3ban w-hleftelak latgily nadman, shoft el ayam ahi le3bet bik mish has'alak 3amalet eih fik
Ana 'alby tab 3an hobbo lik, battalt ashoof doniety b3nek.
Wady akhret elly yemshi warak yla'i fel awel zay malak w-ysalem lik maybansh 3alik zalamt 'alby, ta3abto ma3ak.
ودي اخره الي يمشي وراك
يلقاك في الاول زي ملاك
ويسلم ليك
ميبانش عليك
ظلمت قلبي تعبتوا معاك
وانا كنت خلاص متعلق بيك
معرفتنش ان ده كل ده فيك
اتاريك بتقول في كلام وخلاص
واتاريك ولا ليك في الاحساس
انا عشت ليك
كنت انا وياك
هتقولي ايه؟
ماخلاص هنساك
هتجيلي تقول في غيابي تعبان
وحلفتلك لتجيلي ندمان
شفت الايام اهي لعبت بيك
مش هسالك عملت ايه فيك
انا قلبي تاب عن حبوا ليك
بطلت اشوف دنيتي بعنيك
